title: Macro F1-Score Keras
description: Keras Macro F1-Score ImplementationHi all! Here there is my implementation of the Macro-F1-Score in keras/tensorflow that gives the same results of the sklearn implementation on 'macro' mode and has very similar values to the LB scores. Both y_true and y_pred are matrices of size (batch_size, 28).
description_lemmatized: kera macro f1score implementationhi implementation macrof1score kerastensorflow give result sklearn implementation macro mode similar value lb score y_true y_pred matrix size batch_size 28
